Class StaffDAOMySQLImpl

java.lang.Object
it.unicas.clinic.address.model.dao.mysql.StaffDAOMySQLImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StaffDAO<Staff>
public class StaffDAOMySQLImpl extends Object implements StaffDAO<Staff>
Contains the implementation of the interaction between application and database for Staff table.
